reviewText: Excellent background material and explanation of how we got the Gospel records. Helpful to believers and great introduction to seekers.

Very detailed accounts about the Gospels of the New Testament. Ripped it to my phone to show others. Nice. Sad that it is only 30 minutes. :(
I would recommend you watch Case for Faith, then Case for Christ, both by Lee Strobel. Then watch Jesus Accounts. Perfect for all the skeptics.
